item.title: 伊莱克斯首席执行官约纳斯-萨缪尔森离职
item.description: 伊莱克斯 全球第二大电器制造商伊莱克斯周四表示，其首席执行官约纳斯-萨缪尔森将于 2025 年 1 月 1 日离职。【原文：Electrolux , the world's second-biggest appliances maker, said on Thursday its chief executive Jonas Samuelson would leave his position on Jan. 1, 2025.】

item.title: 第一季度从美国可持续发展基金撤资 88 亿美元，创历史新高
item.description: 研究公司晨星（Morningstar）周四表示，欧美投资者在第一季度对可持续基金表现出了相反的兴趣，美国投资者从可持续基金中的净撤资额达到了创纪录的 88 亿美元。【原文：European and American investors showed converse interest in sustainable funds during the first quarter, research firm Morningstar said on Thursday, with a record $8.8 billion in net withdrawals from the products in the U.S.】

item.title: Downdetector 显示 Reddit 出现数千次宕机
item.description: 据故障监测网站 Downdetector.com 称，社交媒体公司 Reddit 周四有数千名用户宕机。【原文：Social media company Reddit was down for thousands of users on Thursday, according to outage monitoring website Downdetector.com.】

item.title: 中情局禁止中国电信运营商提供美国宽带服务
item.description: 美国联邦通信委员会周四表示，将命令中国电信、中国联通和中国移动的美国分公司停止在美国的固定或移动宽带互联网业务。【原文：The Federal Communications Commission said on Thursday it is ordering the U.S. units of China Telecom , China Unicom and China Mobile to discontinue fixed or mobile broadband internet operations in the United States.】

item.title: 英美资源集团竞购前股价飙升引发泄密质疑
item.description: 英美资源集团（Anglo American）在伦敦上市的股票周三在英国尾盘交易中飙升，此时距离该矿商宣布竞争对手必和必拓集团（BHP Group）出价 390 亿美元还有几个小时，这引起了一些律师、投资者和评论家对可能出现的泄密事件的质疑。【原文：Anglo American's London-listed shares spiked in late UK trade on Wednesday, hours before the miner announced a $39 billion bid by rival BHP Group , raising questions from some lawyers, investors and commentators about possible leaks.】

item.title: 微软支持的 Rubrik 在纽交所上市后股价大涨近 21
item.description: Rubrik 的股价周四在纽约证券交易所首次亮相时上涨了近 21%，使这家由微软支持的网络安全公司的估值达到 67.7 亿美元。【原文：Rubrik's shares rose nearly 21% in their debut on the New York Stock Exchange on Thursday, giving the Microsoft-backed cybersecurity firm a valuation of $6.77 billion.】

item.title: 保守派新闻网站 Gateway Pundit 申请破产
item.description: 极右翼新闻网站 Gateway Pundit 周三申请破产，在此之前，选举工作人员和其他人因该网站谎称 2020 年美国大选被窃取而面临骚扰。【原文：The Gateway Pundit, a far-right news site, filed for bankruptcy Wednesday, following litigation by election workers and others who faced harassment after the site made false claims that the 2020 U.S. election was stolen.】

item.title: 丰田将向印第安纳州工厂投资 14 亿美元，新增 340 个工作岗位
item.description: 丰田汽车公司（Toyota Motor Corp）周四表示，将投资 14 亿美元建设位于印第安纳州的普林斯顿工厂，为组装三排电池电动 SUV 做准备。【原文：Toyota Motor Corp said on Thursday it would invest $1.4 billion in its Princeton facility in Indiana to prepare for assembly of a three-row battery electric SUV.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，如果法律方案失败，字节跳动倾向于在美国关闭 TikTok
item.description: 四位消息人士称，如果中国公司用尽一切法律手段来对抗美国禁止该平台在应用商店销售的立法，TikTok 的所有者字节跳动公司（ByteDance）宁愿关闭其亏损的应用，也不愿将其出售。【原文：TikTok owner ByteDance would prefer shutting down its loss-making app rather than sell it if the Chinese company exhausts all legal options to fight legislation to ban the platform from app stores in the U.S., four sources said.】

item.title: T-Mobile 与 EQT 共同投资 9.5 亿美元收购光纤网络供应商 Lumos
item.description: 无线运营商 T-Mobile 美国公司周四表示，预计将投资约 9.5 亿美元，获得瑞典投资公司 EQT 旗下基金合资企业 50%的股份，该合资企业将收购光纤网络供应商 Lumos。【原文：Wireless carrier T-Mobile US expects to invest about $950 million for a 50% stake in a joint venture with Swedish investment firm EQT's fund that will buy fiber optic network provider Lumos, the companies said on Thursday.】

item.title: 消息人士称，英美资源集团认为必和必拓 390 亿美元的报价不具吸引力
item.description: 两位消息人士告诉路透社，英美资源集团认为必和必拓集团提出的 390 亿美元收购要约不具吸引力，因为一些大型投资者认为这是投机行为。【原文：Anglo American does not consider a proposed $39 billion takeover offer from BHP Group as attractive, two sources told Reuters, as some large investors dismissed it as opportunistic.】

item.title: 美国禁止工人竞业禁止面临艰难的法律斗争
item.description: 专家说，美国联邦贸易委员会对工人通常签署的 "非竞争 "协议的禁令很可能会受到法律挑战，因为一些法院对联邦机构通过广泛规则的权力越来越持怀疑态度。【原文：The U.S. Federal Trade Commission's ban on "noncompete" agreements commonly signed by workers is likely vulnerable to legal challenges, experts said, as some courts have grown increasingly skeptical of federal agencies' power to adopt broad rules.】

item.title: 空客运营利润不及预期，上调A350产量目标
item.description: 空中客车公司公布的第一季度营业利润和现金流低于预期，此前该公司招聘了更多员工以应对不断增长的飞机需求，但重申了其 2024 年的财务目标。【原文：Airbus posted weaker than expected first-quarter operating profit and cashflow after hiring more staff to prepare for rising aircraft demand, but reaffirmed its financial goals for 2024 after a nervous start to the year on industrial costs.】

item.title: 美国银行监管机构计划审查资产管理公司持有的银行股份
item.description: 美国最高银行监管机构选择不考虑对在银行有大量投资的资产管理公司实施更严格监管的新规定，尽管该机构官员也认为这一问题值得更多关注。【原文：A top US bank regulator opted not to consider new rules that would have imposed stricter oversight on asset managers with sizeable investments in banks, even as agency officials agreed the matter merited more attention.】

item.title: 耶伦表示，美国应对中国产能过剩的措施没有任何例外
item.description: 美国财政部长珍妮特-耶伦（Janet Yellen）周四表示，拜登政府在应对中国工业产能过剩的问题上没有采取任何行动，中国的工业产能过剩是美国及其盟国最关心的问题。【原文：The Biden administration is not taking anything off the table with regard to a potential response to China's industrial overcapacity, which is a top concern for the U.S. and its allies, U.S. Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen said on Thursday.】

item.title: 标普将波音公司的前景展望调整为 "负面
item.description: 评级机构S&P全球评级公司周四表示，已将飞机制造商波音公司的评级展望从 "稳定 "调整为 "负面"。【原文：Ratings agency S&P Global Ratings said on Thursday it has revised its outlook on planemaker Boeing to "negative" from "stable".】

item.title: 耶伦称经济表现良好，通胀将退潮
item.description: 美国财政部长珍妮特-耶伦（Janet Yellen）周四表示，美国经济 "继续表现非常非常好"，她仍然认为通胀会回落到更正常的水平。【原文：Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen said on Thursday that the U.S. economy "continues to perform very, very well" and that she still sees inflation falling back to more normal levels.】

item.title: 波交所将把数字资产业务与衍生品和清算部门合并
item.description: 交易所运营商 Cboe Global Markets 周四表示，作为战略审查的一部分，该公司将把目前由 Cboe Digital 提供的数字资产衍生品整合到现有的全球衍生品和清算业务中。【原文：Exchange operator Cboe Global Markets said on Thursday it will integrate its digital asset derivatives, currently offered by Cboe Digital, into its existing Global Derivatives and Clearing business as part of a strategic review.】

item.title: 疲软的 GDP、强劲的物价凸显美联储的两难处境
item.description: 美国第一季度的经济增长在近两年中首次低于美联储对经济长期潜力的估计，但经济增长放缓的迹象伴随着快速通胀，如果持续下去，将给央行带来特别的难题。【原文：U.S. economic growth in the first quarter fell below the Federal Reserve's estimates of the economy's long-run potential for the first time in nearly two years, but the signs of slowing were accompanied with fast inflation that, if sustained, would pose a particular dilemma for the central bank.】

item.title: 罢工持续，钢铁制造商 Acerinox 对第二季度持谨慎态度
item.description: 西班牙钢铁制造商 Acerinox 周四表示，由于欧洲市场疲软以及西班牙工厂长期罢工，该公司预计第二季度未计利息、税项、折旧及摊销前利润（EBITDA）仅会略有改善。【原文：Spanish steelmaker Acerinox said on Thursday it expects earnings before interest, taxes, depreciation and amortization (EBITDA) to improve only slightly in the second quarter due to the weak European market and the prolonged strike at its Spanish mill.】

item.title: 据 The Information 报道，以华为为首的中国企业旨在 2026 年之前制造出先进的存储芯片
item.description: 据《The Information》周四报道，以华为技术公司为首的一批中国芯片公司在中国政府的支持下，计划到 2026 年生产出人工智能芯片的关键部件--高带宽内存（HBM）半导体。【原文：A group of Chinese chip companies led by Huawei Technologies and backed by the country's government aims to produce high-bandwidth memory (HBM) semiconductors, a key component in AI chips by 2026, The Information reported on Thursday.】

item.title: 葛兰素史克就 Covid-19 疫苗技术起诉辉瑞和 BioNTech
item.description: 葛兰素史克公司周四在特拉华州联邦法院起诉辉瑞公司和 BioNTech 公司，指控它们侵犯了葛兰素史克公司与这两家公司的畅销产品 COVID-19 疫苗中的信使 RNA (mRNA) 技术有关的专利。【原文：GlaxoSmithKline sued Pfizer and BioNTech in Delaware federal court on Thursday, accusing them of infringing GSK patents related to messenger RNA (mRNA) technology in the companies' blockbuster COVID-19 vaccines.】

item.title: 全球采矿业顶级交易
item.description: 必和必拓集团（BHP Group）出价 388 亿美元收购了规模较小的竞争对手英美资源集团（Anglo American），以打造全球最大的铜矿商。【原文：BHP Group has bid $38.8 billion for smaller rival Anglo American , offering a deal to forge the world's biggest copper miner.】

item.title: 美国第一季度 GDP 意外放缓，通胀状况不佳
item.description: 美国第一季度的经济增长放缓幅度超过预期，但季度个人消费支出通胀部分出人意料地火爆，表明美联储不会在 9 月前降息。【原文：U.S. economic growth slowed more than expected in the first quarter, but a surprisingly hot quarterly Personal Consumption Expenditure inflation component suggested that the Federal Reserve would not cut interest rates before September.】

item.title: 德事隆将裁员 1500 人，原因是项目取消和需求疲软影响业绩
item.description: 德事隆（Textron）公司周四表示，在美国陆军项目取消和其他一些产品需求下降对其业务造成冲击后，该公司正在扩大重组计划，包括裁员约1500人。【原文：Textron is expanding its restructuring plan to include about 1,500 job cuts, it said on Thursday, after U.S. Army program cancellations and lower demand for some other products hit its business.】

item.title: ASML 新老板福凯必须驾驭中美芯片战
item.description: ASML 的新老板克里斯托夫-福凯（Christophe Fouquet）面临着一个棘手的平衡问题，既要帮助引导这家欧洲最大的科技公司在中美 "芯片战 "中取胜，又要保持集团在竞争对手中的领先地位，还要应对当前的人工智能热潮。【原文：ASML's new boss Christophe Fouquet faces a tricky balancing act in helping to steer Europe's biggest tech company through the US/China "chip war", while maintaining the group's lead over rivals and managing the current AI boom.】

item.title: 美国每周申请失业救济人数意外下降
item.description: 上周新申请失业救济的美国人数意外下降，表明劳动力市场状况依然紧张。【原文：The number of Americans filing new claims for unemployment benefits unexpectedly fell last week, pointing to still tight labor market conditions.】

item.title: 美国第一季度经济增长放缓幅度超过预期
item.description: 美国第一季度的经济增长放缓幅度超过预期，但通胀加速表明，美联储不会在 9 月前降息。【原文：U.S. economic growth slowed more than expected in the first quarter, but an acceleration in inflation suggested that the Federal Reserve would not cut interest rates before September.】

item.title: 由于价格上涨和对无烟替代品的强劲需求，Altria 第一季度销售额位居榜首
item.description: 受价格上涨和对传统烟草产品替代品需求上升的推动，奥特里亚集团（Altria Group）周四公布的季度销售额超出预期。【原文：Altria Group topped quarterly sales expectations on Thursday, driven by higher pricing and rising demand for alternatives to conventional tobacco products.】

item.title: KKR 将从 Blackstone 的房地产投资信托基金手中购买 16.4 亿美元的学生公寓投资组合
item.description: 私募股权投资公司 KKR 周四表示，已同意以约 16.4 亿美元的价格从 Blackstone Real Estate Income Trust 购买由 19 处学生公寓物业组成的投资组合。【原文：Private equity firm KKR has agreed to buy a portfolio of 19 student housing properties from Blackstone Real Estate Income Trust for about $1.64 billion, the companies said on Thursday.】
